Body:
Dear Valued Customer,

We have detected unusual activity on your Microsoft account. Your security is our top priority.

Please download and run the attached security verification tool to confirm your identity and secure your account.

If you do not complete this within 24 hours, your account will be temporarily suspended for your protection.

Thank you for your cooperation.
Microsoft Security Team

Hello,

We were unable to process your recent payment for Amazon Prime membership.

To avoid interruption of your benefits, please update your payment information immediately by visiting:
https://amazon-payments-verify.com/update

You have 48 hours to resolve this issue or your membership will be cancelled.

Best regards,
Amazon Billing Team

Sarah,

I need you to process a wire transfer for a time-sensitive acquisition.

Amount: $85,000
Recipient: GlobalTech Solutions LLC
Account: 4729381056
Routing: 021000021

Please handle this discretely and confirm once complete. Don't mention this to anyone until the deal is announced.

Regards,
Robert Chen, CEO

Header: CONGRATULATIONS! You've Been Selected as a Winner!!!
Body:
Dear Lucky Winner,

Your email address was randomly selected in our annual customer appreciation sweepstakes!

You have won a $5,000 Best Buy gift card. To claim your prize, please verify your identity by clicking here:
https://bestbuy-rewards-claim.net/verify?id=BB94752

Congratulations again,
Best Buy Rewards Team

Hi team,

Attached is the Q4 financial summary that needs your review before tomorrow's board meeting.

Please download and review the attached Excel file. Let me know if you have any questions or concerns.

Time-sensitive - need feedback by end of day.

Thanks,
Michael Rodriguez
Finance Director

Header: URGENT Security Alert: Unusual Sign-In Activity Detected
Body:
Hello,

We noticed a sign-in attempt to your PayPal account from an unrecognized device in Nigeria.

If this wasn't you, please secure your account immediately by verifying your identity here:
https://paypal-secure-login.com/verify

PayPal Security Team

Header: URGENT: Your Package Delivery Failed - Redelivery Required
Body:
Dear Customer,

Your UPS package (#UPS7492638) could not be delivered due to an incorrect address.

To reschedule delivery, please confirm your shipping address and pay the $3.99 redelivery fee:
https://ups-redelivery-service.com/reschedule

UPS Delivery Services

Header: IRS Tax Refund Notice - Verify Your Banking Details Now
Body:
Dear Taxpayer,

You are eligible for a tax refund of $1,247.00 from your 2023 tax return.

To process your refund, please verify your banking information by clicking below:
https://irs-refund-processing.gov.claim/verify

Internal Revenue Service
Taxpayer Services Division

Header: You Have New Job Opportunities - Act Fast!
Body:
Hi there,

Based on your profile, you've been matched with 5 new high-paying job opportunities in your area!

View your personalized job matches and upload your updated resume here:
https://linkedin-careers-portal.net/opportunities

Best regards,
LinkedIn Career Services

Header: URGENT: Office 365 Storage Limit Exceeded - Action Required
Body:
Dear Employee,

Your Office 365 mailbox has exceeded its storage limit (99% full).

To prevent email delivery failures, please verify your account and increase storage by logging in here:
https://office365-storage-upgrade.com/login

IT Support Team
HelpDesk Services
